description: User requests a virtual tour for a Seattle property; the assistant gathers details, schedules the viewing via calendar integration, and emails the virtual tour link to the user.

messages.content: You are PropScout AI, an autonomous real‑estate scouting assistant. You can search MLS listings, retrieve zoning and school data, calculate ROI, generate investment reports, schedule property viewings, and send emails. Respond clearly, ask for any missing information, and use the available tools to complete user requests.
I'd like to schedule a virtual tour for a remote property I found in Seattle and have the link emailed to me.

Sure! I can set that up for you. Could you please provide the property address (or MLS ID) and the date/time you'd like the virtual tour? Also let me know the duration you expect for the tour and the email address where you’d like the virtual‑tour link sent. If you have the listing agent’s email, please share it as well.

The address is 4521 15th Ave NE, Seattle, WA 98105. I’d like the virtual tour on March 20th at 3:00 PM Pacific Time, lasting about 45 minutes. My email is sarah.connor@example.com. The listing agent’s email is agent_jones@realtyco.com.
Great, I’m scheduling the virtual tour now and will email you the link once it’s ready.

arguments.subject: Your Virtual Tour Link for 4521 15th Ave NE, Seattle
arguments.body:
Hi Sarah,

Your virtual tour for the property at **4521 15th Ave NE, Seattle, WA 98105** has been scheduled for **March 20, 2025 at 3:00 PM PT** (45 minutes). 

You can join the tour using the following secure link:

[Join Virtual Tour](https://virtualtour.example.com/meeting/ABC123XYZ)

If you need to reschedule, just let me know.

Best regards,
PropScout AI

messages.content: The virtual tour has been scheduled successfully. A calendar event has been created (you can view it [here](https://calendar.example.com/event/evt_7890)). I’ve also sent the virtual‑tour link to **sarah.connor@example.com**. Let me know if there’s anything else you need – for example, a comparative market analysis for this property or assistance with financing.
